Yeah but you wouldn't need to make room to unrar them if they weren't rarred in the first place :p...

Either way, most people don't realize why people rar them. Not so much as compressing but splitting the files in 15 megabyte increments. 

I hate when I have to unrar/decompress a video that isn't compressed any more than it is in the first place before it was zipped/rarred. But I do happen to know why they're zipped up like this

Files like these that show up on torrents usually come from newsgroup downloads. There is a cap on most newsgroups where you can only upload a 15 megabyte file, so hence the file split like this :P..

They show up on here like they were on the news groups.

There are also the ignorant people that don't know any better that think there is some benefit to having them put like that as well. Those people should realize that it serves no purpose other than wasting the down loader's time having to uncompress the file :P.. Hope that clears up some of the air..
